term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - oxygen-flask combustion, in spectrochemical analysis
term.title: oxygen-flask combustion

item.text: In order to determine elements which are easily volatilized, or are present as volatile species, organic material may be ashed in oxygen in a closed oxygen combustion system. One such method is oxygen-flask combustion by which the test sample is burned in a closed flask containing oxygen and an absorbing solution in which the analytes are subsequently determined.
